messages.message:
Hi Team
I have a JIRA settings suggestion. Is it possible to set up some inheritance for the child issues?
Currently, it’s quite annoying that for every child issue, one needs to add some properties again like labels
I think some admin JIRA privileges are required for setting that.
https://support.atlassian.com/jira-service-management-cloud/docs/inherit-all-parent-attributes/

Yup, this can be set up per project, don’t think it should be across all projects though. Which project are you looking at? Do you have specifics field in mind? Labels, anything else? 

Send a ticket to IT with specifics and @derrick.smith can help you out from there.
Yes, please submit a ticket to <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com> and I'm happy to grab it and take a look :slightly_smiling_face:
